title: Outstanding Placement Award 2018
name: Outstanding Placement Award 2018
body:
Outstanding Placement Award 2018
(Award of Appreciation in recognition of participation and outstanding performance in WCE placement drive 2018, for getting placed in Microsoft India R&D.)
  • Issuing Organization: Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Walchand Collegeof Engineering, Sangli.
  • Issuing Date: April 2018.
  • Credential URL: Verify Achievement
  • I received the award from the Director of the Walchand College of Engineering, Sangli, Dr. G. V. Parishwad.
